Text: When the fuck where these chicks teenagers, 1985??

I think most of the people who will read this have better stuff than this in their collection already.

This is a two hour collection of clips from Vivid, recorded from 1997 to 2001. The clips have nothing in common except that they have Asian women in them. Some of the clips have opening titles, with credits, but others, such as the first one, don't. What that tells me is that these scenes were were lifted from longer pieces that included non-Asian women. There is some anal sex. The video quality is poor, and most scenes have badly executed dubbing. It includes sales pitches for telephone sex lines and Vivid sex toys, including a variety of plastic pussies.
Thanks so much to Jane136. Always nice to see a detailed review. Now those who want it can get it and the rest of us can save our bandwidth. Also thanks to the uploader for their efforts.

Asian Velvet Teen is a 4 hour DVD
This is CD2
